    *   [Parameters][170]## text### Parameters*   `text` **[string][171]** text of the button## text### Parameters*   `text` **[string][171]** text of the button## textDisplay text for the panel item.Type: [String][171]## type### Parameters*   `type` **[string][171]** css type of the button from styles.css## type### Parameters*   `type` **[string][171]** css type of the button from styles.css## type### Parameters*   `type` **[string][171]** Type attribute for the select, although not used in the template. Defaults to 'text'.## type### Parameters*   `type` **[string][171]** Specifies the type of the input element (e.g., 'text', 'password'). Defaults to 'text'.## image### Parameters*   `image` **[string][171]** optional, if specified image will be displayed left to the text, image path + name located in folder static## image### Parameters*   `image` **[string][171]** optional, if specified image will be displayed left to the text, image path + name located in folder static## image### Parameters*   `image` **[string][171]** optional, if specified image will be displayed left to the text, image path + name located in folder static## imagePosition### Parameters*   `image` **[string][171]** optional, if specified image will be displayed left or right to the text, left is default
    Type left, right## link### Parameters*   `link` **[string][171]** optional, if specified button will redirect before action## link### Parameters*   `link` **[string][171]** optional, if specified button will redirect before action## link### Parameters*   `link` **[string][171]** optional, if specified button will redirect before action## linkURL for the navigation.Type: ([String][171] | null)## clickType### Parameters*   `type` **[string][171]** button type when in forms## formId### Parameters*   `formId` **[string][171]** to determine form## onClick### Parameters*   `onClick` **[function][172]** function when the button is clicked## onClick### Parameters*   `onClick` **[function][172]** function when the button is clicked## onClick### Parameters*   `onClick` **[function][172]** function when the button is clicked## label### Parameters*   `label` **[string][171]** Label to display above the select dropdown. Optional.## label### Parameters*   `label` **[string][171]** Label to display above the input. Optional.## value### Parameters*   `value` **([string][171] | [number][173])** The current value of the select dropdown.## value### Parameters*   `value` **([string][171] | [number][173])** Current value of the input.## small### Parameters*   `small` **[string][171]** Small text to display above the select dropdown for extra information or description. Optional.## small### Parameters*   `small` **[string][171]** Small text to display above the input for extra information or description. Optional.## name### Parameters*   `name` **[string][171]** Name attribute for the select dropdown. Optional.## name### Parameters*   `name` **[string][171]** Name attribute for the input. Optional.## options### Parameters*   `options` **[Array][174]<[Array][174]<([string][171] | [number][173])>>** An array of options for the select dropdown. Each option is an array where the first element is the value and the second element is the display text.### Examples```javascript
options={[
        ["10", "10 minút"],
        ["60", "1 hodinu"],
        ["240", "4 hodiny"],
        ["480", "8 hodín"],
        ["1440", "1 deň"],
      ]}
```## inline### Parameters*   `inline` **[boolean][175]** If set, the label will be on the left and the input on the right. Optional.## inline### Parameters*   `inline` **[boolean][175]** If set, the label will be on the left and the input on the right. Optional.## placeholder### Parameters*   `placeholder` **[string][171]** Placeholder text for the input. Optional.## required### Parameters*   `required` **[boolean][175]** If set, the input will be required. Optional.## fallbackCopyTextToClipboardnepouzivat priamo toto je len fallback, volana iba z copyTextToClipboard### Parameters*   `text` &#x20;## copyTextToClipboardonly after component mount### Parameters*   `text` &#x20;## isValidEmaillib/utils/helpers/input.validation.ts### Parameters*   `email` **[string][171]** The email to validate## isValidPasswordStronglib/utils/helpers/input.validation.ts### Parameters*   `password` **[string][171]** The password to validate## isValidPasswordMediumlib/utils/helpers/input.validation.ts### Parameters*   `password` **[string][171]** The password to validate## isEmptyDetermines if an object (often a form object) is empty.### Parameters*   `obj` **[Object][176]** Object to check.### Examples```javascript
const formData = {
  name: 'John',
  age: 25
};
console.log(isEmpty(formData));  // Outputs: false
```Returns **[boolean][175]** True if the object has no properties, false otherwise.## writableThis module provides utilities for routing and navigation within a Svelte application.
It exports a writable Svelte store (`route`) to keep track of the current route,
as well as helper functions to navigate programmatically.## routeA writable Svelte store that holds the current application's route (path).
Initialized with the current window's location pathname.## addEventListenerAn event listener that updates the `route` store when the browser's back/forward buttons are used.## navigateNavigates to a given path programmatically.### Parameters*   `path` **[string][171]** The path to navigate to.## navigateWithPrefixNavigates to a given path programmatically, but with the added `currentPrefix`.
Useful for apps with base path or dynamic segment in the route.### Parameters*   `path` **[string][171]** The path to navigate to after the prefix.## RouterObjRepresents a Router object that manages and resolves site routes.### groupFunction sets a prefix for all other nested routes
prefix: /dashboard -> all other routes are ->  dashboard/something#### Parameters*   `prefix` **[string][171]** prefix of all other nested routes
*   `callback` **[function][172]** another nested routes belongs hereReturns **[boolean][175]** ### groupGetFunction sets a prefix for all other nested routes
prefix: /dashboard -> all other routes are ->  dashboard/something#### Parameters*   `prefix` **[string][171]** prefix of all other nested routes
*   `component` **SvelteComponent** component to be on a "" route
*   `callback` **[function][172]** another nested routes belongs hereReturns **[boolean][175]** ### getDefines a leaf route#### Parameters*   `path`  route to target
*   `target` **svelteHTML** target svelte component that will be rendered### collapseFlattens a nested route structure into an array of routes.#### Parameters*   `routes` **[Object][176]** Nested routes object with paths as keys and values as page names or nested routes.Returns **[Array][174]** Array of flattened routes with properties: `route` (full path) and `page` (associated page/component).### collapseRecRecursive part of collapse function, it flattens a nested route structure into an array of routes.#### Parameters*   `routes` **[Object][176]** Nested routes object with paths as keys and values as page names or nested routes.
*   `parent` **[string][171]** Current base path for nested routes. (optional, default `''`)Returns **[Array][174]** Array of flattened routes with properties: `route` (full path) and `page` (associated page/component).### resolvePropsResolves the properties associated with a given site route.#### Parameters*   `siteRoute` **[string][171]** The route from the site to be resolved.Returns **[Object][176]** An object containing properties related to the resolved route.
If the route is not found, an empty object is returned.### resolveResolves the given site route to its associated page. If no match is found, returns the default page.#### Parameters*   `siteRoute` **[string][171]** The route from the site to be resolved.
*   `defaultPage` **svelteHTML** The default page to return if no matching route is found.Returns **svelteHTML** The page/component associated with the given site route or the default page if not found.### regexRouteFunction checks route against siteRoute and handles its special form
Example:
siteRoute: /dashboard/E8YRO897AS, route dashboard/\*#### Parameters*   `siteRoute` **[string][171]** currentRoute of the site
*   `route` **[string][171]** route to check againstsReturns **[boolean][175]** ## getPropsByExtracts named parameters from a site route based on the route pattern.### Parameters*   `siteRoute` **[string][171]** The actual route, e.g. "/user/123/profile".
*   `route` **[string][171]** The route pattern with named parameters, e.g. "/user/{id}/profile".### Examples```javascript
const props = getProps("/user/123/profile", "/user/{id}/profile");
  // props would be: { id: "123" }
```Returns **[Object][176]** An object containing the named parameters and their corresponding values.## urlThe URL or path to which the link should point within the SPA (Single Page Application).Note: This is designed for JavaScript-based routing within the application.
If you wish to navigate outside the SPA or to an external link, consider using a regular `<a>` tag.Type: [String][171]## reloadDetermines if navigation should force a page reload.Type: [Boolean][175]## baseRouteDetermines if the dynamic prefix should be bypassed.
When set to true, the dynamic prefix stored in the prefix store is ignored.
Useful for base or root routes.Type: [Boolean][175]## actionAction that is run before redirect to url addressType: [function][172]## getCardthis method will return title, span, position and other attributes of the element### Parameters*   `id` **any** of the card## getDatathis method will return data for the card### Parameters*   `id` **any** of the card## modes### Parameters*   `modes` **[array][174]** Modes that card can be in## getDefaultModeReturns the default mode called 'default'## cardStates### Parameters*   `cardStates` **[Object][176]** the card states of the card## updateSettings### Parameters*   `updateSettings` **[function][172]** function to update Settings of the card, only used in a dashboard view## theme### Parameters*   `theme` **[String][171]** default one is 'default' other options are: 'dashed'## component### Parameters*   `component` **[String][171]** name of the card from card config## error### Parameters*   `error` **[String][171]** type of the card from error.js## error### Parameters*   `error` **[String][171]** type of an error message from errors.js## onCardStatesModified### Parameters*   `onCardStatesModified` **[function][172]** used to update states in a dashboard view## timeframeFromload data
Only usable on server side### Parameters*   `token` **any**&#x20;## getErrorTypesReturns an array of error types with corresponding messages## getErrorMessageByTypeReturns message if error type exists### Parameters*   `type` **[string][171]** type of error message## svgPath for the icon of the panel item.Type: [String][171]## foreignLinkIndicates if the link is external to the SPA.Type: [Boolean][175]## selectedDetermines if the current panel item is selected.Type: [Boolean][175]## collapsedIndicates if the sidebar or panel is in a collapsed state.Type: [Boolean][175]## hasSubpagesIf page has subpages /\*\* will be appended to end of link to stay selected in subpages
Warning! This option might trigger multiple navbar links to be selectedType: [Boolean][175]## ButtonBeehives
This page shows a list of all beekepers beehives## ButtonBeehiveToken
This page provides one of the options to add new beehive with token## Button## PercentageCardBeehive
This page shows one beehive with its corresponding data## onMountBeehiveAdd
This page allows beekeper to add new beehives to their account with multiple options## onMount## onMount## onMount## SettingsItemBeehiveEdit
This page shows edit options for a particular beehive## DayItemCalendar
This page displays a calendar that hold important events for beekeepers## HelpDropdownHelp
This page is for resolving user related problem and providing explanations#### setReadSets notification to state 'read'### Parameters*   `id`  id of the notification## removeDeletes notification from database and removes it from page### Parameters*   `id`  id of the notification## registerServiceWorkerRegisters a service worker that tries to send continuous notifications even when page is closed## askPermissionAsks for permission to send notifications trough browser## getCookie### Parameters*   `name` &#x20;**Meta***   **deprecated**: Gets a cookie by name## messageSet of message utility functions### getMessageReturn a text of a message that was last setReturns **[string][171]** ### setMessagesets a new message to be displayed#### Parameters*   `value`  {string}### isMessageSetChecks if any message is presentReturns **[boolean][175]** ### getMessageRefReturns a reference to writable objectReturns **[writable][79]** ### resetMessageResets message to empty string## fetchUsernacita pouzivatelove data zo servera## onLoadcallback po nacitani vybratych dat### Parameters*   `dataTypes`  vyber dat (array)
